article: I'm Molly .My best friend is Annie .When I was a little girl at a summer camp , a girl came up to me and wanted to play  _  me ."Be my best friend ?She asked and gave me her  _  .So Annie and I knew each other and became  _  .A few weeks later , I went to find Annie  _  I wanted to shared my chocolate with her .Annie  _  chocolate ! I thought you were Molly's best friend !"Annie said ,"Yeah, but today I want a(n)  _  friend ."I tried not to  _  .I ran to the river ,threw away the  _  and cried loudly .Just then I felt a hand on my shoulder .
